body.p: This is a demo of the FP Taglib.

There is a completely normal XML Data page index.xml, viewed with the StyleSheet page-html.xsl, containing multiple <item/> Nodes, that can be individually edited. This is this functionality that the FP TagSet brings.
Click on the [edit] link above to edit this Item, click on the [add] link to add a new Item, before this one.

There is an XML File using the FP TagLib that provides for editing, called form/item-edit.xml and another called form/item-add.xml for adding. They are both viewed using this StyleSheet form/form-html.xsl.

item.title: Another Item
item.body: This field for instance, is handled as XML. If you write bad XML into it and try to save, you should get a parser error.
